name: Space Station Simulator (itch)
description:
Space Station Simulator is an early prototype I am developing.

Build your space station, and manage astronauts performing vital tasks.

Your job is to balance the opportunities, constraints, difficulties, and dangers that space presents.

Will you thrive? Or barely survive?

Controls

WASD - Move Camera

Scroll Wheel - Zoom Camera

C - Center Camera

LMB - Place Tile / Object

RMB - Cancel All

ESC - Cancel All
